__data__.text: This is Crowd Agent at 2025年02月13日（星期四）09:30 Plan：Wake up at 6；Arrive at CHIJMES plazas by 7:00；Move and wait orderly according to guidance by 8:00；Observe crowd density and adjust stopping position by 9:00；Continue orderly movement and waiting throughout the morning；Take a short break and adjust position based on congestion by 11:00；Follow on-site guidance for movement and waiting during lunch break；Resume orderly movement and waiting after lunch by 13:00；Adjust position based on crowd density in the afternoon by 15:00；Continue moving and waiting according to guidance until evening；Stay in designated area and observe crowd flow by 18:00；Follow on-site instructions for final movement and waiting by 19:00；Depart from CHIJMES plazas by 20:00
